Text: John Griffith Contracthanded this back to me about weeks ago and said put it to one side and well maybe offer later on Is now later on David

REOriginal Message From Lavorato John Sent Thursday May AM To Oxley David Subject Lets make sure that Presto Tycholiz Whitt Lucci Kerigan and Proffit are either signed or will never sign by the end of this month

FW Woodlands Country Club MembershipThought Id ask you first David Original Message From Frevert Mark Sent Thursday June PM To Oxley David Subject RE Woodlands Country Club Membership How about Dave Duran Mark Original Message From Oxley David Sent June To Frevert Mark Subject FW Woodlands Country Club Membership Any suggestions about who we might offer this to David Original Message From Brown Aaron Executive Comp Sent Thursday June PM To Oxley David Subject RE Woodlands Country Club Membership seems like a pretty good deal transfer fee payable by Enron per month dues free golfing for members including all family at coursesall but TPC where theres a minimal charge guest charge is about per round golf cart rental fee is per person dont need if you have your own tennis is freehr for indoor pool access pay for food at restraunts Original Message From Oxley David Sent Thursday June PM To Brown Aaron Executive Comp Subject RE Woodlands Country Club Membership How does it work do you still have to pay to play Original Message From Brown Aaron Executive Comp Sent Thursday June PM To Oxley David Subject FW Woodlands Country Club Membership David do you know anyone who might want a membership to the Woodlands The memberships are transferable and might be a good deal for someone better than having to pay the initiation fee of something like grand or so Aaron Original Message From Lessor Mary Sent Thursday June PM To Butler Pam Brown Aaron Executive Comp Subject Woodlands Country Club Membership We have a membership available for transfer at the above subject club Please let me know if you hear of anyone wanting a membership here Thanks

RE Cc Original Message From Lavorato John Sent Thursday May AM To Oxley David Cc Kitchen Louise Subject I told Jean that she could pay Bilbury K and nonthing else I told her that I completely disagree with any payment so view it as a payment to her or for her to be happy This upset her She wanted to give him k later and I vetoed that Is that how you spell vetoed John

RESo I take it we will let Presto sign this week Original Message From Lavorato John Sent Monday May PM To Oxley David Subject Send me a latest and greatest contract summary I think that Presto honestly just didnt have time to read his Other than him I consider this process finished and all other outstanding documents expired When I rework the summary we will sit down and talk about it John

RE Cc timo Vegas Florida or Pebble Beach Business Plan presentations and market overviews of minutes from each BU with an emphasis on obstacles to making budget internal andor external and opportunities for growth andor new businesses I would add discussion topics on how can we findkeep best talent and what are challenges Trading track and AAs how do we increase collaboration and value creation between ENA EWS groups best forum for exchanging above information on ongoing basis culture and PULSE results and complaints about agressive and stressful environment at ENA Diversity of team and how can we improve it coaching and mentoring of Managers and Directors to improve their readiness to become VPs Play one afternoon and night of arrival etc Award ceremony for best excuses for not making budgets worst haircut most inventive use of a business suit Seriously I would be delighted to set something up Believe it or not I have a couple of people who can help with planning et al My suggestion would be to mirror the Lakes offsite we had back last May David Original Message From Lavorato John Sent Wednesday May PM To Allen Phillip Arnold John Arora Harry Baughman Edward D Beck Sally Belden Tim Calger Christopher Collonges Remi Colwell Wes Davies Derek Davis Mark Dana Deffner Joseph Devries Glen Devries Paul Duran W David Foster Chris H GilbertSmith Doug Gonzalez Orlando Haedicke Mark Herndon Rogers Jacoby Ben Josey Scott Kishkill Joe Kitagawa Kyle Lagrasta Fred Lavorato John LeDain Eric Luce Laura Martin Thomas A McKay Jonathan Miller Don Miller Michael L Milnthorp Rob Mrha Jean Neal Scott Oxley David Parquet David Perlman Beth Presto Kevin Redmond Brian Shively Hunter S Sturm Fletcher Swerzbin Mike Thompson C John Tricoli Carl Tycholiz Barry Vickers Frank Wiggs Brett Wolfe Greg Yzaguirre Max Zufferli John Cc Kitchen Louise Subject Hello everyone In December we decided to kill our planned offsite due to market volatility Louise and I would like to get everyone together offsite probably in late June once Louise is back from holiday just kidding I think its time to go have a little fun with the group driving Enrons success I would like suggestions as to Where to go What should be the focus of the business meetings Should we have business meetings or should we do something else ie climb a mountain Im not a strong bid on climbing a mountain And any other ideas you have In addition I would like to start having staff meetings about once a month The first one will be Friday May th at pm Please add this to your schedule I have invited everyone who has PL responsibility Portland Calgary and Toronto will have to be on Video or Phone conference Regards John
